title.narrative: Pilot AMC for Pneumococcal Vaccines - Capital

description.narrative: This activity (Pilot AMC for Pneumococcal Vaccines - Capital) is a component of Pilot Advance Market COMMITTMENT (AMC) for Pneumococcal Vaccines reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £337,001,873. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD), International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (Trust Fund). The start date is 17-06-2009 and the end date is 31-03-2021.
